name: Paradox of the Cryptomancers
description: Prepare to embark on a journey to solve the enigmatic puzzles of the Cryptomancers. Immerse yourself in an awe-inspiring world where you will need your wits to unlock the ancient mysteries of this haunted realm.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.0 GHz or faster Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M or higher Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space
